game.name: Armed Road
game.description:
Your favourite city is in danger. Everywhere you can spot the dangerous criminals and domination gangsters. The only way to escape from them is to drive your car through the heavy-armed vehicles. Would you be able to take the charge of this automatic racing blue colour car? If yes, join Armed Road and gear up to control an armed car like a pro driver on a busy road. Your mission in this brand new action-packed challenge is to cleanse your beloved city from the dirty gangsters. 
Make sure to move your vehicle left and right to avoid the collision with other vehicles. Criminal mind-set drivers will also try to stop you from moving forward through other ways. Keep your eyes on their activities, destroy as many vehicles as you can through your armed vehicles and tell them that you are the only owner of this road. Collect the coins while racing down the road and do not forget to use them to upgrade your weapons to keep your fun going for as long as possible!
Put your fingers on the mouse or arrow keys or tap the screen of your mobile phone to move your vehicle left and right! Gun down your enemies before they throw you out of the game in this HTML5 shooting game! You will be given only three lives to use in this wild online racing game. Track how many coins you have earned as of now by looking at the top left corner of the screen! The top right corner of the screen will show your present score. Good luck to drive for as long as possible to reach out to the highest score possible!
game.metaTitle: Armed Road Game - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Armed Road at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
